duties_responsibilities.duty: Discover, analyze, profile, and document findings on source data systems.
Create source to target mappings using business rules to transform data.
Assist development team during the development phase to resolve data issues and understand data constraints.
Create and maintain data sets for Data Mining and Predictive Analytics.
Drive the testing of the final data output.
Interact regularly with all levels within the organization, including developers, architects, business users, and management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree from four-year College or University; or three to four years related experience within an IT Department, preferably within a Data Warehouse and/or equivalent combination of education and work experience.
